short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Try to figure out what the color it is

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Color quiz is a small Google Chrome training extension. The main idea is to get some practice to understand what the color is on the screen and provide a correct answer. The extension is good for front-end devs and designers and for everyone how wants to test attentiveness and knowledge of colors and their hex values.
